events.message: I received my order last week, but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer’s message contains keywords related to a refund request, so the case is categorized accordingly.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, could you kindly send a photo of the product you received and confirm the order number?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing that the product does not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process. You should see the money back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund process update. I appreciate your help resolving this issue promptly.
The refund has been successfully processed. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and to check if everything is satisfactory now.
Since your issue has been resolved and there are no further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey to share your feedback about our service today.
